title: YTRP / YTRPV
blurb: Minimal front-end for yt-dlp â€” YTRP (audio-first) & YTRPV (video-first) with templates, subs, and playlist flow.
description: YTRP/YTRPV is a small interface around yt-dlp. YTRP focuses on clean audio rips (m4a/mp3/opus/flac) with embedded metadata and cover art; YTRPV focuses on video rips with muxed best-video+audio, embedded/sidecar subtitles, and chapters. Build a command to paste into your terminal or point this page at a local API wrapper for one-click runs. Use responsibly and comply with source-site terms.

versions.notes: Playlist range controls, timestamp section downloads, and templates.
Audio-first mode (YTRP) with metadata and thumbnail embedding.
